label: Livestock and Farming Supplies
description: Supplies and equipment for livestock and farming, including chicken coops, pig pens, sheep handling systems, and more.
intents: Find information on farming and livestock care

subcategories.label: Chicken Coops
subcategories.description: Housing for chickens, including coops, runs, and nesting boxes.

subcategories.label: Pig Pens
subcategories.description: Enclosures for pigs, including pens, houses, and feeders.

subcategories.label: Sheep Handling Systems
subcategories.description: Equipment for handling and caring for sheep, including feeders, footbaths, and turnover crates.

subcategories.label: Livestock Feed and Supplements
subcategories.description: Feed and supplements for various types of livestock, including cows, sheep, and chickens.

subcategories.label: Livestock for Sale
subcategories.description: Livestock for sale, including chickens, pigs, cows, and goats.
